thread.title: Daily News Pet of the Week: Scoop
thread.title_full: Daily News Pet of the Week: Scoop

title: Daily News Pet of the Week: Scoop
text:
THE Daily News Pet of the Week is Scoop, a 6-year-old domestic-shorthair cat at the Pennsylvania SPCA.
Scoop, a black cat who loves head scratches, came to the PSPCA in a cruelty investigation in 2013. He's on a special diet to prevent an upset stomach. He would do best in a home without dogs or young children.
For more information about Scoop, call the PSPCA at 215-426-6300; stop by the shelter, on Erie Avenue near B Street, North Philadelphia; or visit pspca.org.
More coverage Pet of the week: Cha Cha is spunky, opinionated and sensitive Pet of the week: Juno enjoys long walks, behaves well on a leash Pet of the week: Sammy is energetic, opinionated and loyal
